name: Burger Girl's Funky Shift: 済世
name_original: Burger Girl's Funky Shift: 済世
description:
Not everyone can be a hero.

Not everyone leads a glamorous life.

But everyone is the hero of their own story.

And those stories should be told.

Burger girl is an immigrant. She's got a shit job at a shit spot and  a nice car on cinder blocks. Whatever life throws at her, she keeps going, hoping for a better future, no matter how far away that might be.

This game is a window to another world, a single shift in the shoes of someone else, a look into the first circle  of minimum wage hell.

Submission for Ludum Dare 48
